Kasungu is a town in the Central Region of Malawi. It is also the home town of Malawi's first president Hastings Banda.Road accidents claim two lives in Kasungu | Malawi 24 - Malawi news| Kasungu District Hospital the first to pilot the WHO Essential Package for Non-Communicable diseases prevention and control interventions in Malawi | WHO | Regional Office for Africa ==References== Category:Settlements in Malawi Category:Towns in Africa
